titles.title: Organ Coordination Improvement Act
To amend the Public Health Service Act to authorize grants to carry out programs to improve recovery rates for organs in eligible hospitals.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Environment.

bill.summary: 10/12/2000--Introduced. Organ Coordination Improvement Act - Amends the Public Health Service Act to authorize grants to qualifying organ donation entities for the purpose of assisting such entities in carrying out programs to coordinate the activities of eligible hospitals that relate to seeking organ donations.
